name: Super Rod
description: Allows you to fish for Pokémon. Fishing for Pokémon takes one hour, and the Pokémon you catch is random.

The Super Rod allows you to catch Araquanid, Blastoise, Carracosta, Clawitzer, Cloyster, Dewgong, Dragalge, Empoleon, Feraligatr, Floatzel, Gastrodon, Golduck, Golisopod, Gorebyss, Greninja, Gyarados, Huntail, Jellicent, Kabutops, Kingdra, Kingler, Lapras, Ludicolo, Lumineon, Malamar, Mantine, Milotic, Omastar, Politoed, Poliwrath, Primarina, Relicanth, Samurott, Seadra, Seaking, Sealeo, Seismitoad, Sharpedo, Slowbro, Slowking, Starmie, Swampert, Tentacruel, Toxapex, Wailord, Walrein.
